FL had a $1.8 billion in cash at 6/30/21 no? Isn’t that more than enough for the two acquisitions ? Plus they have long term investments of say $700-800 million which is largely the GOAT investment. So we are looking at say $2.6 billion between the cash and investments and no debt at 6/30/21. Plus the company probably earned a boat load in the quarter ending today no? School season, people exercising in the summer? I’d think the CEO saw the 20 point drop in the stock as a buying opportunity. I would hope he sees it this way. Hopefully GPS sees it that way too. Does BAC analyst think he or she is the first person to figure out the NKE issues affect FL? Genius! To think this analyst get paid nearly $1 million a year plus restricted stock. Pathetic. Happy to see them hit the stock today on old news. Bought more and hopefully it gets hit more so I can keep buying. The BBBY news should affect FL at all. Shouldn’t affect GPS either. Totally different businesses. FL should probably take on debt at a few percent interest before taxes to buy back stock. Why not?
